triples.name: Symposium on Theory of Computing
triples.relevance: This paper is published as part of STOC 2023, the 55th annual symposium on the theory of computing.

triples.name: Theoretical Computer Science
triples.relevance: The conference focuses on theoretical computer science research, which is the foundation for all papers presented.

triples.name: Theory of Computation
triples.relevance: Theory of computation is a core branch of theoretical computer science that underlies the research presented at STOC.

triples.name: Algorithm
triples.relevance: Algorithms are a central topic of computational theory and a primary focus area for STOC research.

triples.name: Computational Complexity Theory
triples.relevance: Computational complexity theory is a major area of research in theoretical computer science represented at STOC.
